verses.verse: And <WG2532> the fifth <WG3991> angel <WG32> sounded <WG4537>, and <WG2532> I saw <WG1492> a star <WG792> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> fallen unto <WG1519> the earth <WG1093>: and <WG2532> there was given <WG1325> to <WG1519> him <WG846> the key <WG2807> of the pit <WG5421> of the abyss <WG12>.

And <WG2532> he opened <WG455> the pit <WG5421> of the abyss <WG12>; and <WG2532> there went up <WG305> a smoke <WG2586> out <WG1537> of the pit <WG5421>, as <WG5613> the smoke <WG2586> of a great <WG3173> furnace <WG2575>; and <WG2532> the sun <WG2246> and <WG2532> the air <WG109> were darkened <WG4654> by reason <WG1537> of the smoke <WG2586> of the pit <WG5421>.

And <WG2532> out <WG1537> of the smoke <WG2586> came <WG1831> forth locusts <WG200> upon <WG1519> the earth <WG1093>; and <WG2532> power <WG1849> was given <WG1325> them <WG846>, as <WG5613> the scorpions <WG4651> of the earth <WG1093> have <WG2192> power <WG1849>.

And <WG2532> it was said <WG4483> unto them <WG846> that <WG2443> they should <WG91> not <WG3361> hurt <WG91> the grass <WG5528> of the earth <WG1093>, neither <WG3761> any <WG3956> green thing <WG5515>, neither <WG3761> any <WG3956> tree <WG1186>, but <WG1487> only <WG3441> such <WG3748> men <WG444> as have <WG2192> not <WG3756> the seal <WG4973> of God <WG2316> on <WG1909> their <WG846> foreheads <WG3361>.

And <WG2532> it was given <WG1325> them <WG846> that <WG2443> they should <WG615> not <WG3361> kill <WG615> them <WG846>, but <WG235> that <WG2443> they should be tormented <WG928> five <WG4002> months <WG3376>: and <WG2532> their <WG846> torment <WG929> was as <WG5613> the torment <WG929> of a scorpion <WG4651>, when <WG3752> it striketh <WG3817> a man <WG444>.

And <WG2532> in <WG1722> those <WG1565> days <WG2250> men <WG444> shall <WG2212> seek <WG2212> death <WG2288>, and <WG2532> shall <WG2147> in no <WG3756> wise find <WG2147> it <WG846>; and <WG2532> they shall <WG2147> desire <WG1937> to die <WG599>, and <WG2532> death <WG2288> fleeth from <WG575> them <WG846>.

And <WG2532> the shapes <WG3667> of the locusts <WG200> were like unto <WG3664> horses <WG2462> prepared <WG2090> for <WG1519> war <WG4171>; and <WG2532> upon <WG1909> their <WG846> heads <WG2776> as it were <WG5613> crowns <WG4735> like <WG3664> unto gold <WG5557>, and <WG2532> their <WG846> faces <WG4383> were as <WG5613> men <WG444>'s faces <WG4383>.
And <WG2532> they had <WG2192> hair <WG2359> as <WG5613> the hair <WG2359> of women <WG1135>, and <WG2532> their <WG846> teeth <WG3599> were <WG2258> as <WG5613> teeth of lions <WG3023>.

And <WG2532> they had <WG2192> breastplates <WG2382>, as it were <WG5613> breastplates <WG2382> of iron <WG4603>; and <WG2532> the sound <WG5456> of their <WG846> wings <WG4420> was as <WG5613> the sound <WG5456> of chariots <WG716>, of many <WG4183> horses <WG2462> rushing <WG5143> to <WG1519> war <WG4171>.

And <WG2532> they have <WG2192> tails <WG3769> like <WG3664> unto scorpions <WG4651>, and2532, 2258 stings <WG2759>; and <WG2532> in <WG1722> their <WG846> tails <WG3769> is their <WG846> power <WG1849> to hurt <WG91> men <WG444> five <WG4002> months <WG3376>.

<WG2532> They have <WG2192> over <WG1909> them <WG846> as king <WG935> the angel <WG32> of the abyss <WG12>: his name <WG3686> in Hebrew <WG1447> is Abaddon <WG3>, and <WG2532> in <WG1722> the Greek tongue <WG1673> he <WG846> hath <WG2192> the name <WG3686> Apollyon <WG623>.
The first <WG1520> Woe <WG3759> is past <WG565>: behold <WG2400>, there come <WG2064> yet <WG2089> two <WG1417> Woes <WG3759> hereafter <WG5023>.

And <WG2532> the sixth <WG1623> angel <WG32> sounded <WG4537>, and <WG2532> I heard <WG191> a <WG3391> voice <WG5456> from <WG1537> the <WG5064> horns <WG2768> of the golden <WG5552> altar <WG2379> which <WG3588> is before <WG1799> God <WG2316>,

one saying <WG3004> to the sixth <WG1623> angel <WG32> that <WG3739> had <WG2192> one trumpet <WG4536>, Loose <WG3089> the four <WG5064> angels <WG32> that <WG3588> are bound <WG1210> at <WG1909> the great <WG3173> river <WG4215> Euphrates <WG2166>.

And <WG2532> the four <WG5064> angels <WG32> were loosed <WG3089>, that <WG3588> had been prepared <WG2090> for <WG1519> the hour <WG5610> and <WG2532> day <WG2250> and <WG2532> month <WG3376> and <WG2532> year <WG1763>, that <WG2443> they should kill <WG615> the third part <WG5154> of men <WG444>.

And <WG2532> the number <WG706> of the armies <WG4753> of the horsemen <WG2461> was twice <WG1417> ten thousand <WG3461> times ten thousand <WG3461>: <WG2532> I heard <WG191> the number <WG706> of them <WG846>.

And <WG2532> thus <WG3779> I saw <WG1492> the horses <WG2462> in <WG1722> the vision <WG3706>, and <WG2532> them <WG3588> that sat <WG2521> on <WG1909> them <WG846>, having <WG2192> breastplates <WG2382> as <WG5613> of fire <WG4447> and <WG2532> of hyacinth <WG5191> and <WG2532> of brimstone <WG2306>: and <WG2532> the2776, 2462 heads <WG2776> of lions <WG3023>; and <WG2532> out <WG1537> of their <WG846> mouths <WG4750> proceedeth <WG1607> fire <WG4442> and <WG2532> smoke <WG2586> and <WG2532> brimstone <WG2303>.

By <WG5259> these <WG5130> three <WG5140> plagues was the third part <WG5154> of men <WG444> killed <WG615>, by <WG1537> the fire <WG4442> and2532, 1537 the smoke <WG2586> and <WG2532> the <WG1537> brimstone <WG2303>, which <WG3588> proceeded <WG1607> out <WG1537> of their <WG846> mouths <WG4750>.

For <WG1063> the power <WG1849> of the horses is <WG2076> in <WG1722> their <WG846> mouth <WG4750>, and <WG2532> in <WG1722> their <WG846> tails <WG3769>: for <WG1063> their <WG846> tails <WG3769> are like unto <WG3664> serpents <WG3789>, and <WG2532> have <WG2192> heads <WG2776>; and <WG2532> with <WG1722> them <WG846> they hurt <WG91>.

And <WG2532> the rest <WG3062> of mankind <WG444>, who <WG3739> were <WG615> not <WG3756> killed <WG615> with <WG1722> these <WG3778> plagues <WG4127>, repented <WG3340> not <WG3756> of <WG1537> the works <WG2041> of their <WG846> hands <WG5495>, that <WG2443> they should <WG4352> not <WG3361> worship <WG4352> demons <WG1140>, and <WG2532> the idols <WG1497> of gold <WG5552>, and <WG2532> of silver <WG693>, and <WG2532> of brass <WG5470>, and <WG2532> of stone <WG3035>, and <WG2532> of wood <WG3585>; which <WG3739> can <WG1410> neither <WG3777> see <WG991>, nor <WG3777> hear <WG191>, nor <WG3777> walk <WG4043>:

and they <WG3340> repented not <WG3756> of <WG1537> their <WG846> murders <WG5408>, nor <WG3777> of <WG1537> their <WG846> sorceries <WG2532>, nor <WG3777> of <WG1537> their <WG846> fornication <WG4202>, nor <WG3777> of <WG1537> their <WG846> thefts <WG2809>.
